#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
	int t,n;
	string a;
	sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a;
		n=a.length();
		reverse(a.begin(),a.begin()+n/2);
		reverse(a.begin()+n/2,a.begin()+n);
		cout<<a<<endl;		
	}
	return 0;
}
